Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Ripon College banned the display of the poster, when in fact the college did not ban it.
Understate: The claim understates the fact that the poster is not a "9/11 memorial" as it depicts multiple incidents, not just 9/11.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide specific evidence or sources to back up the assertion that the poster was banned because it may offend Muslims.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the reason for discouraging the display of the poster was solely because it may offend Muslims, without considering other possible reasons or concerns.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations for why the poster may have been discouraged, such as concerns about promoting stereotypes or creating a hostile environment.
